thread.title: ZTE expands its Nougat beta program to the Zmax Pro
thread.title_full: ZTE expands its Nougat beta program to the Zmax Pro

author: Kris Carlon
title: ZTE expands its Nougat beta program to the Zmax Pro
text:
Last year ZTE launched a Nougat beta program for the Axon 7 to provide early access to Android 7.0 in exchange for bug reports and so on. To continue the good will into the new year, the company is now extending that beta to owners of the Zmax Pro .
See also: Which Android manufacturer updates its phones the fastest? 4 hours ago You’ll need to be a member of the Z-Community to register and if selected for the program you’ll be on the hook for capturing logs, submitting bug reports and completing surveys and other debugging tasks. It’s a relatively small price to pay though for early access to Nougat and your contributions will help iron things out for the wider community.
The beta program is only open for U.S. residents, but if that caveat doesn’t exclude you then feel free to hit the button below to sign up. Note that registering doesn’t guarantee admission and if you are chosen you’ll have to sign a non-disclosure agreement before getting your grubby paws on ZTE’s Nougat secrets.
REGISTER FOR ZTE ZMAX PRO NOUGAT BETA Are you rocking the Zmax Pro? Pumped for Nougat?
